roleset.name: call a meeting

example.name: agentive
example.text: As Jaguar's biggest holder and Britain's biggest car maker, Ford-1 could turn up the heat by *trace*-1 convening a special shareholders' meeting and urging holders to drop the limits early.

example.name: meeting as subject
example.text: The group's resilience gets its first test today when 30 top pilot union leaders convene outside Chicago in a previously scheduled meeting.

roleset.note: Frames file for 'convene' based on financial subcorpus and automatic expansion via verbnet; nominal 'convening' based on BOLT-7.

example.name: nominal rel: convening
example.text: [ Original ] Welcome to the 18th convening of the Party Congress , steadfastly believing in the triumph of Marxism and Leninism
